LibraryInfo.Author: NEDA System Architects
LibraryInfo.Description: NEDA Activity Template Library - Professional Grade Workflow Components

ActivityTemplate.Name: Read File
ActivityTemplate.Description: Reads content from a file with configurable encoding and buffering

Parameter.Name: FilePath
Parameter.Description: Full path to the file to read

RegexConstraint.Message: Must be a valid Windows file path

RangeConstraint.Message: Buffer size must be between 1KB and 1MB

Parameter.Name: RetryOnLock
Parameter.Description: Retry if file is locked by another process

Parameter.Name: Content
Parameter.Description: The content read from the file

Parameter.Name: FileSize
Parameter.Description: Size of the file in bytes

Parameter.Name: ReadTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken to read the file in milliseconds

Property.Name: TimeoutSeconds
Property.Description: Maximum time to wait for file access

ActivityTemplate.Name: Write File
ActivityTemplate.Description: Writes content to a file with configurable encoding and locking

Parameter.Name: FilePath
Parameter.Description: Full path to the file to write

Parameter.Name: Content
Parameter.Description: Content to write to the file

Parameter.Name: AppendMode
Parameter.Description: Append to existing file instead of overwriting

Parameter.Name: CreateDirectory
Parameter.Description: Create parent directories if they don't exist

Parameter.Name: WriteTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken to write the file in milliseconds

Parameter.Name: FileHash
Parameter.Description: SHA256 hash of the written content

Property.Name: AtomicWrite
Property.Description: Use atomic write operations (write to temp then rename)

ActivityTemplate.Name: Start Process
ActivityTemplate.Description: Starts an external process with configurable arguments and environment

Parameter.Name: EnvironmentVariables
Parameter.Description: Environment variables to set for the process

Parameter.Name: UseShellExecute
Parameter.Description: Use shell execute (required for GUI applications)

Property.Name: PriorityClass
Property.Description: Process priority (Idle, BelowNormal, Normal, AboveNormal, High, RealTime)

Property.Name: ErrorDialog
Property.Description: Show error dialog if process fails to start

ActivityTemplate.Name: Read Registry
ActivityTemplate.Description: Reads values from Windows Registry with security validation

Parameter.Name: ValueName
Parameter.Description: Name of the value to read (empty for default value)

Parameter.Name: ValueKind
Parameter.Description: Type of the registry value (String, DWord, QWord, etc.)

ActivityTemplate.Name: HTTP Request
ActivityTemplate.Description: Performs HTTP/HTTPS requests with advanced features like retry, timeout, and authentication

Parameter.Name: Url
Parameter.Description: The URL to send the request to

RegexConstraint.Message: Must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL

Parameter.Name: Method
Parameter.Description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, etc.)

Parameter.Name: Headers
Parameter.Description: HTTP headers to include in the request

Parameter.Name: Body
Parameter.Description: Request body (automatically serialized based on Content-Type)

Parameter.Name: StatusCode
Parameter.Description: HTTP status code of the response

Parameter.Name: Success
Parameter.Description: Whether the request was successful (2xx status code)

ActivityTemplate.Name: WebSocket Connection
ActivityTemplate.Description: Establishes and manages WebSocket connections with message handling

ActivityTemplate.Name: Data Transformation
ActivityTemplate.Description: Transforms data using configurable mapping rules and transformations

Parameter.Name: InputData
Parameter.Description: Input data to transform (object, dictionary, list, etc.)

Parameter.Name: TransformationRules
Parameter.Description: Mapping rules for transformation (input field -> output field)

Parameter.Name: ProcessingTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for transformation in milliseconds

Property.Name: ParallelProcessing
Property.Description: Use parallel processing for large datasets

ActivityTemplate.Name: Data Validation
ActivityTemplate.Description: Validates data against schema, rules, and constraints

Parameter.Name: ValidationSchema
Parameter.Description: JSON Schema or validation rules definition

Parameter.Name: ValidationRules
Parameter.Description: List of validation rules to apply

Parameter.Name: StrictMode
Parameter.Description: Stop on first error or collect all errors

Property.Name: MaxErrors
Property.Description: Maximum number of errors to collect

Category.Name: AI
Category.Description: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning activities

ActivityTemplate.Name: AI Model Inference
ActivityTemplate.Description: Runs inference using trained AI/ML models with GPU acceleration support

Parameter.Name: ModelPath
Parameter.Description: Path to the trained model file

Parameter.Name: InputData
Parameter.Description: Input data for inference (tensor, array, or object)

Parameter.Name: InferenceTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for inference in milliseconds

Parameter.Name: MemoryUsage
Parameter.Description: Memory usage in MB during inference

Property.Name: WarmupIterations
Property.Description: Number of warmup iterations before timing

ActivityTemplate.Name: Text Analysis
ActivityTemplate.Description: Performs NLP text analysis including sentiment, entities, and key phrases

Parameter.Name: Language
Parameter.Description: Language of the text (Auto for detection)

Parameter.Name: AnalysisTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for analysis in milliseconds

Property.Name: UseDeepAnalysis
Property.Description: Use deep neural networks for more accurate analysis

ActivityTemplate.Name: Encrypt Data
ActivityTemplate.Description: Encrypts data using various algorithms with key management

Parameter.Name: PlainText
Parameter.Description: Data to encrypt (string, byte array, or serializable object)

Parameter.Name: EncryptionTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for encryption in milliseconds

Property.Name: BlockMode
Property.Description: Block cipher mode (CBC, ECB, GCM, etc.)

Property.Name: StoreKeyInVault
Property.Description: Store encryption key in secure vault

ActivityTemplate.Name: User Authentication
ActivityTemplate.Description: Authenticates users with multiple factor support and session management

Parameter.Name: AuthenticationTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for authentication in milliseconds

ActivityTemplate.Name: Conditional Branch
ActivityTemplate.Description: Evaluates conditions and branches workflow execution accordingly

Parameter.Name: ContextData
Parameter.Description: Context data available for condition evaluation

Parameter.Name: EvaluationTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for evaluation in milliseconds

ActivityTemplate.Name: Parallel Execution
ActivityTemplate.Description: Executes multiple activities in parallel with synchronization

Parameter.Name: Activities
Parameter.Description: List of activity IDs to execute in parallel

Parameter.Name: WaitForAll
Parameter.Description: Wait for all activities to complete before continuing

Parameter.Name: FailOnFirstError
Parameter.Description: Fail immediately if any activity fails

Parameter.Name: TotalExecutionTime
Parameter.Description: Total time taken for parallel execution in milliseconds

Property.Name: TaskScheduler
Property.Description: Task scheduler to use (Default, ThreadPool, Custom)

ActivityTemplate.Name: Error Handler
ActivityTemplate.Description: Handles errors and exceptions in workflow execution with recovery strategies

Parameter.Name: Context
Parameter.Description: Execution context at the time of error

Parameter.Name: Handled
Parameter.Description: Whether the error was successfully handled

Parameter.Name: RecoveryAction
Parameter.Description: Action taken to handle the error

Parameter.Name: RecoveryTime
Parameter.Description: Time taken for error recovery in milliseconds

Property.Name: RecoveryHistory
Property.Description: Number of recovery attempts to remember

ActivityTemplate.Name: Database Query
ActivityTemplate.Description: Executes database queries with parameterization and result mapping

Parameter.Name: RowCount
Parameter.Description: Number of rows affected or returned

Property.Name: ParameterValidation
Property.Description: Validate query parameters for SQL injection

Item.Value: SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite

ActivityTemplate.Name: Bulk Database Insert
ActivityTemplate.Description: Performs high-performance bulk inserts into databases

Parameter.Name: Data
Parameter.Description: Data to insert as dictionary collection

Parameter.Name: CreateTable
Parameter.Description: Create table if it doesn't exist

Parameter.Name: RowsPerSecond
Parameter.Description: Insert rate in rows per second

Property.Name: UseBulkCopy
Property.Description: Use native bulk copy when available

Property.Name: KeepNulls
Property.Description: Keep null values in source data

Property.Name: TableLock
Property.Description: Use table lock for faster inserts
